the crew was always glad to get back home .

because they 'd all be so happy to be home .
output.sentences: The boat was heading into the port.
It had been a long trip and the people aboard were glad to be heading home.
Excitement swelled as they neared their final destination.
The excitement at the dock was palpable.
Later that day, people arrived at their individual homes, happy to be able to relax.
